# Progress Bar

# Basic Example

<progress-bar
  :valid="records.valid"
  :total="records.total"
  :invalid="records.invalid"/>
1
2
3
4

records: { "valid": 6, "invalid": 1, "total": 10 }

Randomize

# Props

Name Type Description Default
valid Valid Array or Number null
invalid Invalid Array or Number null
total Total Array or Number null
